meanings.definition: Feeding on only one kind of food.
meanings.sent1: The caterpillar was monophagous, only eating leaves from the oak tree.
meanings.sent2: The bird species is monophagous, consuming only seeds from a specific plant.
meanings.sent3: The picky eater was so monophagous that they would only eat green apples.
meanings.sent4: Her monophagous diet of plain rice symbolized her simple and uncomplicated lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: The monophagous koala's diet of eucalyptus leaves is essential for its survival.

meanings.definition: Restricted to a single type of diet.
meanings.sent1: The monophagous insect only fed on one type of flower nectar.
meanings.sent2: The monophagous bear species relies solely on a diet of fish.
meanings.sent3: The monophagous panda refused to eat anything other than bamboo shoots.
meanings.sent4: Living a monophagous lifestyle, she stuck to her favorite meal every day.
meanings.sent5: The monophagous frog's diet of insects keeps its population in check.
